author: pipermerriam
content: I'm working on our python implementation.  I'm curious if anyone is currently running public bootnodes for any current or in-progress versions of the protocol.

author: djrtwo

author: pipermerriam
content: I have a potentially controversial question:  Has there been any discussion of removing RLP from the discovery v5 protocol?  Either for a custom serialization or SSZ or something else?
